DOC.brief_summary: Primary purpose assess IMA-638 safe improves asthma subject persistent asthma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effect IMA-638 Subjects With Persistent Asthma
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy men woman persistent asthma , 18 70 year age , body weight 50 kg 115 kg . History treatment medium high dose inhale corticosteroid ( ICS ) , without longacting betaagonists ( LABA ) , least 2 month prior screen visit must remain constant study . FEV1 ≥ 55 % ≤ 80 % predict demonstrated improvement FEV1 ( L ) inhale albuterol ( salbutamol ) ( reversibility ) ≥ 12 % .
